<span data-ttu-id="c4373-103">Alle Outlook.com gebruikers profiteren van spam en malware filteren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4373-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4373-104">Voor abonnees van Office 365 Home en Office 365 Personal voert Outlook.com extra screening van koppelingen en bijlagen in berichten die u ontvangt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4373-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4373-105">Voor meer informatie, Lees [Outlook.com geavanceerde beveiliging voor Office 365-abonnees](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4373-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Office 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4373-106">Als u wilt inschakelen of uitschakelen van veilige koppelingen, gaat u naar uw [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4373-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
